creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: heavily embroidered coat with 12 tails; chicken feathers with beads at bottom of each tail; indigo dyed cotton main fabric; black and white striped woven trim on sleeves; multicolored embroidered birds and flowers throughout
medium: Silk, cotton, chicken feathers and seeds, plastic (?), paper (?)
title: Dance coat
